# 

Press Releases 

## All Releases

Year All2024202320222021202020192018201720162015201420132012201120102009200820072006

[ Nov 26, 2024  Progress Unveils Q4 2024 Release for Telerik and Kendo UI, Breaking New Ground in Design-to-Code Processes and Adding Support for .NET 9 and Angular 19  ](/news-releases/news-release-details/progress-unveils-q4-2024-release-telerik-and-kendo-ui-breaking "Progress Unveils Q4 2024 Release for Telerik and Kendo UI, Breaking New Ground in Design-to-Code Processes and Adding Support for .NET 9 and Angular 19") [ Nov 21, 2024  Progress Unveils Native Next.js Support in Sitefinity, Offering Maximum Flexibility to Create and Scale Digital Experiences  ](/news-releases/news-release-details/progress-unveils-native-nextjs-support-sitefinity-offering "Progress Unveils Native Next.js Support in Sitefinity, Offering Maximum Flexibility to Create and Scale Digital Experiences") [ Nov 06, 2024  Progress and emt Distribution Celebrate 10th Anniversary of Successful Partnership  ](/news-releases/news-release-details/progress-and-emt-distribution-celebrate-10th-anniversary "Progress and emt Distribution Celebrate 10th Anniversary of Successful Partnership") [ Oct 31, 2024  Progress Completes Acquisition of ShareFile  ](/news-releases/news-release-details/progress-completes-acquisition-sharefile "Progress Completes Acquisition of ShareFile") [ Oct 28, 2024  Progress Appoints Amanda Arria to the Role of Chief People Officer  ](/news-releases/news-release-details/progress-appoints-amanda-arria-role-chief-people-officer "Progress Appoints Amanda Arria to the Role of Chief People Officer") [ Oct 17, 2024  Progress AI-Powered Flowmon Introduces Up to 10x Search Acceleration for Faster Cyberthreat Hunting and Network Troubleshooting  ](/news-releases/news-release-details/progress-ai-powered-flowmon-introduces-10x-search-acceleration "Progress AI-Powered Flowmon Introduces Up to 10x Search Acceleration for Faster Cyberthreat Hunting and Network Troubleshooting") [ Oct 03, 2024  Progress Announces Winners of the 2024 OpenEdge North America Partner Awards  ](/news-releases/news-release-details/progress-announces-winners-2024-openedge-north-america-partner "Progress Announces Winners of the 2024 OpenEdge North America Partner Awards") [ Sep 24, 2024  Progress Announces Third Quarter 2024 Financial Results  ](/news-releases/news-release-details/progress-announces-third-quarter-2024-financial-results "Progress Announces Third Quarter 2024 Financial Results") [ Sep 18, 2024  Progress Awards 7 Scholarships Across the Globe for its 2024 Women in STEM Scholarship Series  ](/news-releases/news-release-details/progress-awards-7-scholarships-across-globe-its-2024-women-stem "Progress Awards 7 Scholarships Across the Globe for its 2024 Women in STEM Scholarship Series") [ Sep 18, 2024  Progress Brings Industry Leaders Together to Share Insights on AI and Data at MarkLogic World Tour US 2024  ](/news-releases/news-release-details/progress-brings-industry-leaders-together-share-insights-ai-and "Progress Brings Industry Leaders Together to Share Insights on AI and Data at MarkLogic World Tour US 2024") [ Sep 09, 2024  Progress Software to Report Third Quarter 2024 Financial Results on September 24, 2024  ](/news-releases/news-release-details/progress-software-report-third-quarter-2024-financial-results "Progress Software to Report Third Quarter 2024 Financial Results on September 24, 2024") [ Sep 09, 2024  Progress to Acquire ShareFile  ](/news-releases/news-release-details/progress-acquire-sharefile "Progress to Acquire ShareFile") [ Sep 05, 2024  Progress Announces Powerful New Generative AI Capabilities in Latest Release of MarkLogic Server  ](/news-releases/news-release-details/progress-announces-powerful-new-generative-ai-capabilities "Progress Announces Powerful New Generative AI Capabilities in Latest Release of MarkLogic Server") [ Sep 03, 2024  Progress’ Semantic AI Platform Recognized as the Leader in Info-Tech Research Group's 2024 Metadata Management Data Quadrant  ](/news-releases/news-release-details/progress-semantic-ai-platform-recognized-leader-info-tech "Progress’ Semantic AI Platform Recognized as the Leader in Info-Tech Research Group's 2024 Metadata Management Data Quadrant") [ Aug 27, 2024  New Progress Semaphore Release Brings to Market AI-Assisted Knowledge Modeling  ](/news-releases/news-release-details/new-progress-semaphore-release-brings-market-ai-assisted "New Progress Semaphore Release Brings to Market AI-Assisted Knowledge Modeling") [ Aug 08, 2024  Progress Sitefinity Insight Certified as One of the Strongest CDPs for CMS and the Web by Customer Data Platform Institute  ](/news-releases/news-release-details/progress-sitefinity-insight-certified-one-strongest-cdps-cms-and "Progress Sitefinity Insight Certified as One of the Strongest CDPs for CMS and the Web by Customer Data Platform Institute") [ Aug 07, 2024  Progress Announces Conclusion of SEC Investigation into MOVEit  ](/news-releases/news-release-details/progress-announces-conclusion-sec-investigation-moveit "Progress Announces Conclusion of SEC Investigation into MOVEit") [ Jul 31, 2024  Progress Introduces the Latest in Job Orchestration with Chef Courier  ](/news-releases/news-release-details/progress-introduces-latest-job-orchestration-chef-courier "Progress Introduces the Latest in Job Orchestration with Chef Courier") [ Jul 23, 2024  Progress Introduces MarkLogic FastTrack, Helping Organizations Harness the Power of Connected Data  ](/news-releases/news-release-details/progress-introduces-marklogic-fasttrack-helping-organizations "Progress Introduces MarkLogic FastTrack, Helping Organizations Harness the Power of Connected Data") [ Jul 11, 2024  Progress Enhances Web Application Firewall (WAF) Capabilities in LoadMaster 360 to Help Organizations Intuitively Secure Their Web Applications  ](/news-releases/news-release-details/progress-enhances-web-application-firewall-waf-capabilities "Progress Enhances Web Application Firewall \(WAF\) Capabilities in LoadMaster 360 to Help Organizations Intuitively Secure Their Web Applications")
